divs: sighting details sept. 3rd 2012\9:45 p.m. - while walking a friend to her car, i over heard a guy say something about the lights being back, we looked and noticed them right away.i knew it wasn't an airplane or helicopter. this was downtown encinitas, ca. we were facing southeast. we watched the lights for about five minutes as i was saying good by. the object was star size. i walked to my car drove a short distance south and grabed by binoculars and parked on pch facing south. for twent minutes i watched the ufo maintian the same position,with the three orange lights (triangler)fading somewhat in and out, but the most beautiful two violet lights never blinked or went out. i could almost see an outline of the craft, maybe circular but very fuzy. the colors of the lights were only visable with the binoculars.after about twenty minutes, i decided to head home a few minles south. after about 10 minutes of driving, i noticed i couldnt see the lights\object anymore. i was pretty excited to see it, i saw an ufo easter day in laguna beach, ca back in 2008(?), but that was a completely different shaped object.
Summary: Notice two other people looking up into the sky and pointing to the lights. I looked, saw flashinh lights, then grabbed binoculars. Notice 3 orange lights in tiangle shape, two beautiful Voilet ligts on each side. Watch through binoculars for 15 minutes
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Encinitas
There were no other sightings in Encinitas on or around September 3rd 2012
